maker: Painted by Etienne-Jean Chabry the Younger, Gilded by Michel-Barnabe Chauvaux the Elder, Sèvres Manufactory
title: Cup and Saucer (gobelet litron et soucoupe, deuxième grandeur)
description: Cup and Saucer (gobelet litron et soucoupe, deuxième grandeur); Painted by Etienne-Jean Chabry the Younger (French, active 1765 - 1787), Gilded by Michel-Barnabe Chauvaux the Elder (French, born 1730), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; 1773; Soft paste porcelain, turquoise blue (bleu céleste) ground color, polychrome enamel decoration, and gilding; 6.7 × 8.9 × 6.5 cm (2 5/8 × 3 1/2 × 2 9/16 in.); 79.DE.64; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
